name: UpdateTrelloMemberNotificationSettings
description:
Update blocked notification keys for a Trello member's channel.

Use this tool to update blocked notification keys for a specific channel of a Trello member. This is useful when a user wants to change which notifications are blocked for a particular communication channel.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose notification settings will be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID or username of the member

parameters.name: notification_channel
parameters.description: Specify the channel where notifications should be blocked, e.g., 'email'.

parameters.name: blocked_notification_keys
parameters.description: A singular or array of notification keys to block for a specific channel.

blockedKeys.description: Singular key or array of notification keys

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or username of the member

value_schema.description: The ID or username of the member

blockedKeys.description: Singular key or array of notification keys
